Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks had a two-point lead with a minute to go but lost in regulation.
Kyrie Irving scored 43 points and had a standout performance.
Nikola Jokic finished with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver Nuggets finished 14/29 from three-point range.
Dallas Mavericks struggled with perimeter defense and rotation decisions.
